page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KAREN
page.content: I usually get up between 8.00 and 8.15 Breakfast is about 8.45.I have some cornflakes and milk.Then tea and bread with strawberry jam.I set off walking to school at 9.15.School starts at 9.30.We have our first break at 11.20 till 11.35.Potato crisps and milk are sold then.Our lunch hour is from 12.45 till 13.45.I go home for lunch.My favourite foods are eggs,fishfingers, beefburgers,soup or sandwiches.0ur next break is from 14.55 till 15.05. In the summer we play tennis. In the winter we play badminton or work with the computer.School finishes at 16.05. I change out of my school uniform into jeans and an old sweater.I play on my skateboard or with other children.During winter I like to watch T.V.Dinner of fish or meat is at 18.00 I go to bed at 21.30.
